```{python}
import pandas as pd
import plotly.express as px

url = "./대구광역시 달서구_CCTV 설치 위치_20250527.csv"
df = pd.read_csv(url, encoding='cp949')
fig = px.scatter_mapbox(
    df,
    lat='위도',lon='경도',size='카메라대수',
    hover_name='소재지지번주소',zoom=11,height=600,size_max= 10
)
fig.update_layout(
    mapbox_style="carto-positron",
    margin={"r":0,"t":0,"l":0,"b":0}
)

```
